TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class MenuAdapter Inherits WebControlAdapter Implements IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 提供用于修改特定浏览器的 控件行为的方法。

span.span: Provides the means to modify the behavior of the control for specific browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A修改的标记或行为的特定浏览器或浏览器或行为的类作为筛选器控件针对某些功能。A modifies the markup or behavior of a control for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability. 默认情况下，中的对象控件呈现为超链接以满足菜单导航。By default, the objects in the control are rendered as hyperlinks to accommodate menu navigation. 类通过实现维护状态接口，以便它可以响应并在回发期间引发特定事件。The class maintains state by implementing the interface so that it can respond to and raise specific events during postback. 你可以扩展类来进一步自定义呈现或行为控件。You can extend the class to further customize rendering or behavior of the control. 适配器的初始请求会导致.NET 框架搜索控件，映射的适配器给定请求的浏览器的特征。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 类使用浏览器定义文件来确定客户端浏览器的特征以及映射到浏览器类型的适配器。The class uses browser definition files to identify the characteristics of the client browser and to map the adapter to the browser type. 有关 ASP.NET 中的自适应呈现的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information about adaptive rendering in ASP.NET, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).

MemberSignature.Value: public MenuAdapter ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: MenuAdapter();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适配器的初始请求会导致.NET 框架搜索控件，映射的适配器给定请求的浏览器的特征。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 找到相应的适配器后，该控件将保持对中的映射的适配器实例的引用其属性。After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu Control { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu Control
Protected ReadOnly Property Control As Menu
protected: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Menu ^ Control { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Menu ^ get(); };

summary.span: 检索对与此 对象关联的 控件的强类型引用。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the control associated with this object.

value.span: 与当前 对象关联的 控件。

span.span: The control associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够引用适配器的相应控件。The property provides a way to reference the adapter's corresponding control. 当一个适配器关联与特定控件时，.NET Framework 将调用代替或控件的生命周期方法之外的适配器的生命周期方法。When an adapter is associated with a particular control, the .NET Framework will call the life-cycle methods of the adapter in place of or in addition to the life-cycle methods of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以检索控件的父类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the control of the parent class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter/CS/contosomenuadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter/VB/contosomenuadapter.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void LoadAdapterControlState (object state);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadAdapterControlState(object state) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub LoadAdapterControlState (state As Object)
protected public: override void LoadAdapterControlState(System::Object ^ state);

param.name: state
param.span: 包含适配器状态信息的字典形式的 。

span.span: An in the form of a dictionary that contains the adapter's state information.

summary.span: 加载 方法在对页面的前一个请求期间保存的任何控件状态信息。

span.span: Loads any control state information that was saved by the method during a previous request to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当适配器需要维护私有状态信息时，它会重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the and methods. 情况下类，其中显示的菜单层次结构是依赖于以前选择对象，`state`提供其中包含菜单上的层次结构中的选定项的路径的名称/值对的字典。In the case of the class, where the displayed menu hierarchy is dependent on the previously selected object, `state` provides a dictionary of name/value pairs containing the path of the selected item in the menu's hierarchy. `state`参数是对象由保存期间到页面的上一个请求。The `state` parameter is a object saved by the during a previous request to the page. 如果该控件不注册参与控件状态，适配器必须注册控件状态。If the control is not registered to participate in control state, the adapter must register for control state. 除了该控件，与其他生命周期方法不同的状态将保持适配器控件状态。Adapter control state is maintained in addition to the state for the control, unlike other life-cycle methods.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 与此事件关联的 数据。

span.span: The data associated with this event.

summary.span: 将关联的 控件注册为一个要求控件状态的控件。

span.span: Registers the associated control as one that requires control state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联的控件注册为一种要求控件状态。The method registers the associated control as one that requires control state. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 调用 Web 服务器控件的自己方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls the Web server control's own method. 但是之后,服务器控件的属性设置，则.NET Framework 将调用适配器的实现而不是控件的实现的方法。However, after the property of the server control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the method instead of the control's implementation. 使用方法以初始化控件中的设置。Use the method to initialize settings in the control. 在回发，这是用于管理与现有的视图状态数据进行交互的重要阶段。During a postback, this is an important phase for managing interaction with existing view-state data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).

para.span: 如果适配器重写方法，它必须调用相应方法的基类。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.

para.span: 否则为该控件自己的不会引发事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the control's own event will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 与此事件关联的 数据。

span.span: The data associated with this event.

summary.span: 处理关联的 控件的 方法。

span.span: Handles the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用内部`OnPreRender`中的方法类。The method calls an internal `OnPreRender` method in the class. 父类，如数据绑定、 应用样式和事件分配的所有其他预呈现函数执行按预期方式。All other pre-rendering functions of the parent classes, such as data binding, applying styles, and event assignments perform as expected. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 调用控件的方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls the control's method. 但是之后,设置该控件的属性时，.NET Framework 将调用适配器的实现而不是控件的实现的方法。However, after the property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the method instead of the control's implementation. 使用方法以完成控件中的任何设置。Use the method to finalize any settings in the control. 若要在此阶段中控制属性所做的更改将保存到视图状态，但在中做出更改方法不会保存。Changes made to control properties in this phase will be saved to view state, but changes made in the method are not saved. 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).

para.span: 如果适配器重写方法，它必须调用相应方法的基类。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.

para.span: 否则为该控件自己的方法不会引发。

span.span: Otherwise, the control's own method will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RaisePostBackEvent (string eventArgument);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String)
protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument);

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: 一个 ，表示菜单层次结构中当前节点的路径。

span.span: A that represents the path of the current node in the menu hierarchy.

summary.span: 用于在引发回发事件时维护菜单的路径。

span.span: Used to maintain the path of the menu when a postback event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用时事件引发，，并用于维护菜单上的导航路径。The method is called when the event is raised, and is used to maintain the navigation path of the menu. `eventArgument`参数包含分隔的字符串的菜单项的标识当前菜单层次结构中的位置。The `eventArgument` parameter contains a delimited string of menu items that identify the current location in the menu hierarchy. 页的值传递`eventArgument`到关联控件的方法。The page passes the value of `eventArgument` to the associated control's method. 关联控件也会呈现导致回发发生标记元素。The associated control also renders the markup element that causes the postback to occur. 如果该控件呈现的回发的客户端脚本，将从脚本的自变量传递中`eventArgument`参数。If the control renders client-side script for postback, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter. 如果回发导致由简单提交`eventArgument`是`null`。If the postback is caused by a simple submit, `eventArgument` is `null`.

exception.span: 当前节点的深度超出了允许范围。

span.span: The depth of the current node is more than allowed.

exception.span: 无效声明、上次请求后进行了更改或伪造（欺诈）的请求都可能导致这种状况。

span.span: This can be caused by an invalid declaration, by a change since the last request, or by a forged (spoofed) request.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void RenderBeginTag (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderBeginTag(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderBeginTag (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected: override void RenderBeginTag(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 实例，包含用于生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法。

span.span: The instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 添加标记特性，并将表示控件开始标记的标志写入到将被发送至浏览器或设备的输出流中。

span.span: Adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法将添加标记特性，并将该控件的开始标记的标记写入到被发送到客户端浏览器的响应流的输出流。The method adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser. 对象将呈现中单独方法和控件都将关闭通过后续调用方法。The objects will be rendered individually in the method and the control will be closed with a call to the subsequent method. 重写如果想要实现自定义行为。Override when you want to implement custom behavior. 例如，重写方法，如将多个标记写入响应流内容，任何控件之前`
`。For example, override the method to write multiple tags to the response stream before any control content, such as `
`. 使用方法结合方法，可确保开始标记与结束标记在输出的一致性。Use the method in conjunction with the method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void RenderContents (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderContents(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderContents (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected: override void RenderContents(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含可生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法的 。

span.span: The containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 将关联的 控件中关联的菜单项作为一系列超链接写入到输出流。

span.span: Writes the associated menu items in the associated control to the output stream as a series of hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入的关联对象写入输出流为超链接控件。The method writes the objects of the associated control to the output stream as hyperlinks. 方法调用从方法，用于执行呈现到的设备浏览器的标记代码的修改。The method is called from the method and is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser. 在生命周期和仅实际标记创建控件此处完成此阶段之前，应设置控件属性。Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle, and only the actual markup creation for the control done here. 在此阶段的生命周期对控件所做的更改不保存到视图状态。Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state. 保存对控件所做更改，重写事件。For saving changes made to the control, override the event.

exception.span: 当前项的深度超出了允许范围。

span.span: The depth of the current item is more than allowed.
-or-
The current item is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void RenderEndTag (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderEndTag(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderEndTag (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected: override void RenderEndTag(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 实例，包含用于生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法。

span.span: The instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 创建最终的标记，并将控件的结束标记 (tag) 的标记 (markup) 写入发出至浏览器或设备的输出流。

span.span: Creates final markup and writes the markup for the closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将控件的结束标记的标记写入输出流发送到客户端浏览器的响应流。The method writes the markup for the closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser. 在中呈现的特性，样式特性和开始标记方法。The attributes, style attributes, and opening tag are rendered in the method. 呈现对象中单独方法。The objects are rendered individually in the method. 重写如果想要实现自定义行为。Override when you want to implement custom behavior. 例如，重写方法将写入多个结束标记响应流内容，任何控件后如``。For example, override the method to write multiple closing tags to the response stream after any control content, such as ``. 使用方法结合方法，可确保开始标记与结束标记在输出的一致性。Use the method in conjunction with the method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void RenderItem (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem item, int position);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderItem(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem item, int32 position) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub RenderItem (writer As HtmlTextWriter, item As MenuItem, position As Integer)
protected public: virtual void RenderItem(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::MenuItem ^ item, int position);

param.name: writer
param.span: 实例，包含用于生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法。

span.span: The instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

param.name: item
param.span: 对象，包含要写入响应流的属性。

span.span: The object containing the properties to write to the response stream.

param.name: position
param.span: 指定的 对象在菜单层次结构中的位置。

span.span: The position of the specified object in the menu hierarchy.

summary.span: 将一个菜单项以超链接的形式呈现。

span.span: Renders a single menu item as a hyperlink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用从方法来检索其中的样式和来自间距属性对象，并将它们应用于新创建的超链接元素。The method is called from the method to retrieve the styles and spacing attributes from the object and apply them to a newly created hyperlink element. 菜单层次结构中的遍历方法并且将调用方法呈现每个项。The menu hierarchy is traversed in the method and will call the method to render each item. 每个项呈现为超链接和继承的属性和指定的样式控件。Each item is rendered as a hyperlink and inherits the properties and styles of the specified control. 呈现到页的超链接是以下项之一：The hyperlink rendered to the page is one of the following: - 若要打开或选择项的回发事件。A postback event to open or select the item. - 若要导航到中指定的目标的链接属性控件。A link to navigate to the target specified in the property of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override object SaveAdapterControlState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveAdapterControlState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function SaveAdapterControlState () As Object
protected public: override System::Object ^ SaveAdapterControlState();

summary.span: 保存自页面回发到服务器以来对适配器私有控件状态所做的任何更改。

span.span: Saves any changes to the adapter private control state that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器的控件状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用控件状态来维护当前导航路径的菜单。The method uses the control state to maintain the current navigation path of the menu. 当适配器需要维护私有状态信息时，它会重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the and methods. 需要在请求中独立于关联的控件的状态之间保持状态的复杂功能时，适配器可能保持私有的控件状态。An adapter might maintain private control state when there are complex features that need to maintain state across requests, separate from the associated control's state. 适配器需要注册期间的控件状态方法调用中的每个请求。The adapter needs to register for control state during the method call in every request.

MemberSignature.Value: void IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent (string eventArgument);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed
Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String) Implements IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent
virtual void System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument) = System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler::RaisePostBackEvent;

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: 包含要传递到事件处理程序的可选事件参数的 。

span.span: A that contains an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.

summary.span: 赋予 类处理将页面回发到服务器时引发的事件的能力。

span.span: Enables the class to process an event raised when a page is posted back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以使类来处理页回发到服务器时引发的事件。The method enables the class to process an event that is raised when a page is posted back to the server. 页面将传递`eventArgument`到方法。The page passes `eventArgument` to the method.
